name: Centerline Striking
description: Develop precise and rapid strikes along the centerline for maximum efficiency.

cards.title: Chain Punching
cards.description: A continuous series of rapid punches aimed at overwhelming the opponent.
bulletpoints: Keep punches compact and aligned along the centerline
Use wrist relaxation to increase speed

cards.title: Vertical Palm Strike
cards.description: A palm-heel strike aimed at delivering controlled force while protecting the hands.
bulletpoints: Keep the palm vertical and fingers pointed upward
Strike with the base of the palm for added stability
Engage the hips to generate extra power
